title: THE FERRYMAN

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Shepard a dead player. This brings them into the Underworld faction, though they will remain dead. They will become a Vengeful Spirit (role upcoming) You can only have up to three Wandering Spirits.
If a dead player has Cash (Cash is accumulated by hoarding uses of limited use abilities, or being a faction head or Pirate), you may instead Put Them To Rest, where if their role was hidden by any means, it is revealed, and they cannot be used by any necromancers or retributionists, for their soul is now at peace. They become a Rested Spirit (role also upcoming)
You cannot Shepard a player who was killed by public opinion

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bring the dead to peace. You do not care who wins, so long as there are more Rested Spirits than Vengeful Spirits.

desc:
Post 2321
*Have you ever wondered what happens after death? You meet this fine fellow here. If you have the money, he'll take you beyond death and into wherever you deserve to be.*
